message.content:
cs.IT, cs.SP, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.NA. 

The paper deals with the problem of recovering sparse signals using compressive sensing techniques, which is a central topic in the field of information theory (cs.IT) and signal processing (cs.SP). The modified-CS method proposed in the paper involves incorporating prior knowledge about the support of the sparse signal, which is a common approach in machine learning (cs.LG) and optimization (cs.MM). The paper also uses a stochastic framework to analyze the recoverability of modified-CS, which is a technique commonly used in numerical analysis (cs.NA).
